context.p: Copy an existing plan for the Capacity Planner

prereq.p: To copy a plan you must have an existing Plan you wish to copy

info.p: Click the plan view from the nav bar at the top.
Click the Copy button beside the Plan you wish to copy

step.cmd: You will be prompted to enter new name for the Plan

info.p: NOTE: Name must be unique and between 5 and 20 characters
Click the OK button and your Plan will be copied

result.p: A new Plan is created from an existing Plan in the Capacity Planner.
